title: I'm Ready to Confront My Employer
description:
Heather thinks her supervisor is being unfair by not granting her time off request, especially given how instrumental Heather has been to the company's success. - Dr. Laura: "Professionally but bluntly put forth your demands, and be willing to quit if they are not met."

Are you happy with your employer? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
